title: Grow Plant Based Protein in the Garden! | Vegetarian or Vegan Homestead

tasks.task: Planting protein crops in the garden.
subtasks: Prepare the garden bed by mixing wood chips and adding compost.
Create a trench for planting lentil seeds.
Plant lentil seeds (French green, Spanish brown, and French green heirloom varieties) in the trench.
Foster quinoa, amaranth, soybean, peas, spinach, and peanuts growth.
Sprouting soybeans and making soy milk.
